titles.title: Streamlining Aviation for Eligible Veterans Act
Streamlining Aviation for Eligible Veterans Act
To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand certain rehabilitation programs for certain veterans with service-connected disabilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Streamlining Aviation for Eligible Veterans Act
This bill provides that a rehabilitation program under the Department of Veterans Affairs Veteran Readiness and Employment Program may include a program that includes flight training and does not lead to a degree.
